Civilization & Hubs

Cities & Settlements

From prosperous trade capitals to remote mountain keepsâ€”every city holds a story within its walls.

City

Adlens

ğŸ° warring-darkmane-realm

The rare peaceful settlement in the Darkmane Realm. Dark elves who reject violence, defector Golems, and refugee Goldhelms coexist here.

Visit Settlement
City

Akison

ğŸ° state-of-akison

The cherry blossom capital that encompasses its whole island. Five petal-districts. Trade hub to other continents. Ruled from the Iron Bloom.

Visit Settlement
City

Andport

ğŸ° kingdom-of-iyhago

Iyhago's western gate and primary trade hub. The famous bridge to Frada. Ritual oath-walking tradition. Spector (#11 Arashi) based here.

Visit Settlement
City

Anehull

ğŸ° kingdom-of-vacron

Ghost town rebuilt into a war relic resort. Rose covert meetings. Crimson Rooks constant surveillance. Magic dampeners always active.

Visit Settlement
City

Clocester

ğŸ° kingdom-of-vacron

Former mining colony at a tunnel junction. Crystal caverns, frequent ground collapses. Criminal meeting ground. Rose-protected neutral forge.

Visit Settlement
City

Cridbury

ğŸ° nikolem-kingdom

Mountain foothills mining town. Famous for rare minerals. Outsiders get 'lost' in tunnels without Golem guides.

Visit Settlement
City

Fodon

ğŸ° kingdom-of-fodon

Second largest city in Criozevan. Four war-torn districts unified by Lucifer killing all district leaders. Desert. Tense but functional.

Visit Settlement
City

Frada

ğŸ° republic-of-frada

The Glass Bastion. Military republic capital. Grid-street city built for logistics. Senate sits here. Universal military service required of all citizens.

Visit Settlement
City

Glaril

ğŸ° ipadora-kingdom

The largest underwater city in Criozevan. Ipadora family faction governs but piracy is rampant. Rabuka (#4 Arashi), the Shark warrior, makes his home here.

Visit Settlement
City

Grousea

ğŸ° warring-darkmane-realm

De facto capital of the Warring Darkmane Realm. Extremely dangerous. The criminal hub of the northwest.

Visit Settlement
City

Hiypolis

ğŸ° republic-of-frada

Frada's naval capital. Houses the Holo-Tech Forge Docks, War College, and the closest Criozevan surface city to Ipadora Sanctuary.

Visit Settlement
City

Ibeson

ğŸ° goldhelm-kingdom

Scientific capital of all Criozevan. Public labs above, secret government installations below. Birthplace of Kaboom.

Visit Settlement
City

Icogas

ğŸ° republic-of-oredsy

Ancient magic nexus with uncontrolled magical field fluctuations. Butterfly maintains monitoring stations. Dark Paladin (#1 Arashi) is known to be here. Most powerful individuals in Criozevan have worked through this site.

Visit Settlement
City

Imuton

ğŸ° republic-of-oredsy

Ancient forest city where residents live inside tree-trunk hollows. No new construction allowed â€” the city grows only as the forest grows.

Visit Settlement
City

Ipadora Sanctuary

ğŸ° ipadora-kingdom

Near-zero crime rate. The most peaceful city in Criozevan by every measure. Welcomes all races and nations. Ipadora Royal Family governs. Underwater palace, bioluminescent gardens.

Visit Settlement
City

Iyhago Prime

ğŸ° kingdom-of-iyhago

The Sanctum Spiral. The Quiet Harmonic theocracy's capital, built on the island of Vehalo. Three sacred bridges connect it to outer districts. Veles, Master of Magic, resides here.

Visit Settlement
City

Klanron

ğŸ° kingdom-of-vacron

HQ of the Butterfly organization. Meeting point for all Magic Societies. 90% magic-user population. Peninsula between two rivers.

Visit Settlement
City

Klosdon

ğŸ° nikolem-kingdom

Peaceful Golem forest town. Few rules, few visitors. Famous for strange glowing plants at night.

Visit Settlement
City

Kusamori

ğŸ° state-of-akison

Built on platforms above an ancient canopy. Specializes in medicine, herbs, and poisons. Connected by tram. Most educated healers in Criozevan trained here.

Visit Settlement
City

Mayson

ğŸ° kingdom-of-fodon

Desert town. Many crypts beneath the town square. Residents do not excavate.

Visit Settlement
City

Neruvalis

ğŸ° state-of-akison

The Disappearing City. Submerged partially during high tide. Sea-gate port to the underwater city of Glaril. The only reliable connection point to Ipadora waters.

Visit Settlement
City

Okbridge

ğŸ° state-of-akison

The gateway between Akison's main island and the Criozevan mainland. Heavy customs inspection. Engineer guilds run the bridge mechanisms.

Visit Settlement
City

Oniofast

ğŸ° state-of-akison

Pegasus' hidden operational HQ. No magic practitioners, no Rose, no Butterfly allowed. Home of the Signal Harvest collection ritual.

Visit Settlement
City

Oredsy

ğŸ° republic-of-oredsy

The dueling capital of Criozevan. The Fereltharn Arena hosts daily public sword contests. Tower of Vaelrin marks Oredsy's lost hero. Pegasus controls the republic. Selvarin, Master of Swords, resides here.

Visit Settlement
City

Ovodon

ğŸ° goldhelm-kingdom

Capital of the Goldhelm Kingdom. Home of the Gilded Cradle castle. Hostile to outsiders. Every resident is monitored.

Visit Settlement
City

Phaaross

ğŸ° nikolem-kingdom

Bridge city between Nikolem and Vacron. Strong Golem military presence. Critical trade hub between northwest and northeast.

Visit Settlement
City

Plodrough

ğŸ° kingdom-of-fodon

Desert canyon town with an underground city carved vertically into the cliff walls. Near where Vulkran's remains rest.

Visit Settlement
City

Skellmoor

ğŸ° independent

The floating city with no laws. Criminals, exiles, and outlaws live in harmony under a crude social contract. The black market for advanced technology. Multiple Arashi members have ties here.

Visit Settlement
City

Sloumont

ğŸ° kingdom-of-fodon

Dry plains farming town. River agricultural port. The most peaceful settlement in the Kingdom of Fodon.

Visit Settlement
City

Suudon

ğŸ° nikolem-kingdom

The mist-shrouded swamp capital of Nikolem. Home of the Golem King. Rumored underground city beneath the Great Lake.

Visit Settlement
City

Ubraamore

ğŸ° kingdom-of-iyhago

Crimson Rooks outpost and the black market technology capital of Criozevan. Holotech components unavailable elsewhere flow through Ubraamore's shadow markets.

Visit Settlement
City

Uyrand

ğŸ° kingdom-of-iyhago

Rose HQ. Vertical skyscraper city with memory archive towers storing thousands of years of magical records. The administrative capital where Iyhago's governmental operations run.

Visit Settlement
City

Vacron

ğŸ° kingdom-of-vacron

Largest city on the continent. Central hub for trade and commerce. Strict law. Crimson Rooks HQ. Where the Crimson Knight lives.

Visit Settlement
City

Vlurg

ğŸ° warring-darkmane-realm

The black market capital. Town built around its central market. Elves speak Nualthyr when they prefer not to be understood.

Visit Settlement
City

Wrediff

ğŸ° warring-darkmane-realm

Hidden dark elf warrior training ground. Shielded by magic. No trade â€” only forges, shrines, and poison-makers.

Visit Settlement
City

Wrofast

ğŸ° republic-of-oredsy

Oredsy's primary maritime port. The metallic blue 'W'-emblazoned ships of Wrofast are the most distinctive merchant fleet in Criozevan. Sailor Speak originated here.

Visit Settlement
City

Zhuiburn

ğŸ° republic-of-oredsy

Perpetual flames from volcanic vents. Hostile to outsiders. Pyrrhith language spoken exclusively. Lucifer (#6 Arashi) was born here. The city where the Crimson Convergence's most destructive phase began.
